About Me

Let me tell you about myself

Who am I?

My name is Brian Holland and I am from the Bay Area. I am transitioning into the software developer industry after finally deciding to pursue my hobby as a career. I love solving problems by creating solutions and learning new things along the way. Most of my free time is spent learning new technologies by building projects and taking courses in areas that I'm interested in.


I am interested in finding a developer position that will build upon my current skillset and allow me to continue learning new technologies while building the future of tech. I have a version of my resume below with some of the technologies I have worked with, as well as a downloadable version as well.
